objects.description: T9000 searches removable storage devices for files with a pre-defined list of file extensions (e.g. *.doc, *.ppt, *.xls, *.docx, *.pptx, *.xlsx). Any matching files are encrypted and written to a local user directory. (Citation: Palo Alto T9000 Feb 2016)

external_references.description: Grunzweig, J. and Miller-Osborn, J.. (2016, February 4). T9000: Advanced Modular Backdoor Uses Complex Anti-Analysis Techniques. Retrieved April 15, 2016.
